title: Gradient Scotoma
info: Mutual Observation from the Perspectives of AI and Art
description: As a collaborative project between AI engineer Yu-Lin Tsai and artist Mu Duan, this exhibition delves into the concept of artificial intelligence as a black box, employing metaphors of gradients and blind spots. Through the intersection of technology and art, the creators offer a unique perspective on the relationship between humans and AI, guiding viewers to explore the convergence of technology and culture.
